name: Jump Over It
description:
Jump Over It is a hard try platformer game. You can play solo or with your friend on same keyboard just like in old times. You have to help to Jumpy Bears to reach end of the level , which is hintered by traps,moving platform and sometimes yourself. 
Find your own way by a simple jump or even a wall jump flip, It is up on YOU.

Controls: 
Player 1 : A / D -  rotate left /right  ;  W - flip ; S - smaller jumps  ; Q - respawn

Player 2 : Left / Right Arrow- rotate ; Up Arrow - Flip; Down Arrow - Small jump
Num 0 - Respawn;

Good luck  , Have fun !
